text.p: The next time a villain card enters play you may play a card

ul.li: The next time a hero target would be dealt damage redirect the damage to a hero target of your choice
Deal 2 melee damage to a target
One player may use a power

front.text: If there are hero targets in play other than Madcap treat Madcap as a villain target, not as a hero or hero target, except for determining victory or H.

text.p: The next time a hero card enters play, you may play a card

ul.li: The next time a hero target would deal damage, redirect the damage to a villain target of your choice
Deal 1 irreducible melee damage to a target
Play the top card of the villain deck. A hero may play two cards

card.name: Smack!
card.text: Deal 1 melee damage to a target. If it is not your turn, deal 2 melee damage to the same target

quote.text: Assault kicked me before I could recover and strike my next target. The hit didn't feel that hard, but it sent me sliding across the floor, into a trio of chairs with plastic seats.

card.name: Zoom!
card.text: Deal 2 melee damage to a target. If it is not your turn, you may deal 1 melee damage to a second target

quote.text: Assault moved to kick one of the desks. It went flying into the air in the same instant I threw myself to the ground.

card.name: Biff!
card.text: Deal 1 melee damage to a target. If it is not your turn, deal 1 melee damage to up to 2 additional targets

quote.text: When his hand passed through, he reached just a little further to grab a desk and heave it my way.

card.name: A Change of Pace
card.text: Discard any number of cards. Draw X cards, where X = 1 + the number of cards you discarded in this way

quote.text: "Felonies, sure, but I haven't killed anyone, and that's got to be worth something. Now, this is just a suggestion, but what if I switched sides?"

card.name: Preparation
card.text: The first time a villain target would deal damage to a hero target each turn deal 1 melee damage to that villain target

quote.text: "We'll be covert. I'm talking a fast, hard hitting strike. Attack is always preferable over defense."

card.name: Redirection
card.text: The next time a villain card would deal damage redirect that damage to a target of your choice, then destroy this card

quote.text: Assault was a kinetic energy manipulator, and could control the energies of movement, acceleration and motion much like other heroes could manipulate flame or electricity.

card.name: Reaction
card.text: Increase damage you deal by 1 when it is not your turn

quote.text: He used the energy from Battery's kick to rocket towards us, as Battery moved around to flank.

card.name: Insult to Injury
card.text: The first time a hero target other than Assault deals 4 or more damage to a non-hero target each turn you may play a card

quote.text: "You're cute. Nice body, and the costume is a nice mix of pathetic and adorable in a three-legged-puppy kind of way. But you don't want to try to stop me. I hit pretty damn hard."

card.name: Snap Decision
card.text: The next time an environment card enters play destroy it and deal 3 projectile damage to a target. Then destroy this card

quote.text: Madcap rebounded off of the wall as though he were made of rubber and ducked beneath her incoming kick.
She snapped her head to look up and saw him in the middle of a leap over her head. He'd timed it perfectly, so he would be above her when she rounded the corner.

card.name: Madcap Antics
card.text: You may play cards and use powers even if another card says you can't

quote.text: "Maybe you've changed me. Your good looks, your winning personality, and your diehard persistence in the face of so many defeats at my hand."

text.p: Whenever a hero target would be dealt damage redirect that damage to Assault.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card

quote.text: Assault leapt to meet him, open hand outstretched in some ludicrous parody of a high-five... and launched Leviathan skyward and away with a touch, sending him hundreds of feet into the air. Assault smashed back down onto... no, into the roof, cracking it with the impact

card.name: Transformer
card.text: Whenever damage is redirected you may choose to either increase it by 1, reduce it by 1, or leave it unchanged

quote.text: Grue directed a stream straight at Assault, but the first second of fire seemed to skim right off the man.
